cards.name: Neo
cards.bio: The prophesied One, capable of manipulating the Matrix.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Neo in a black trench coat with sunglasses performing martial arts in a digital world

cards.name: Trinity
cards.bio: A skilled hacker and fighter, deeply loyal to Neo.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Trinity in black leather attire performing a high kick with a futuristic cityscape in the background

cards.name: Morpheus
cards.bio: The captain of the Nebuchadnezzar, a mentor to Neo.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Morpheus with reflective sunglasses and a long coat, holding a gun in a dystopian world

cards.name: Agent Smith
cards.bio: A powerful agent of the system, seeking to capture Neo.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Agent Smith in a suit and sunglasses, with a menacing expression in a green code rain background

cards.name: Cypher
cards.bio: A disillusioned member of the crew, with his own agenda.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Cypher with a cunning smile, holding a plug of the Matrix in a dimly lit spaceship

cards.name: Oracle
cards.bio: A mysterious and wise figure who can predict the future.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: The Oracle, an elderly woman, baking cookies in a cozy, oracle-like kitchen environment

cards.name: Seraph
cards.bio: The guardian of the Oracle, a master martial artist.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Seraph in a golden suit, fighting with fluid martial arts moves in a temple

cards.name: Niobe
cards.bio: A skilled pilot and fighter, Morpheus's former lover.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Niobe in a pilot suit, maneuvering a hovercraft through a tunnel system

cards.name: The Merovingian
cards.bio: A powerful and cunning information broker.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: The Merovingian in a lavish suit, sipping wine in an opulent French restaurant

cards.name: Persephone
cards.bio: The Merovingian's wife, with her own secrets.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Persephone in an elegant dress, holding a silver handgun with a mysterious smile

cards.name: Agent Smith (Final Form)
cards.bio: The ultimate form of Agent Smith, now a virus threatening both the Matrix and the real world.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Agent Smith in multiplied forms, taking over the Matrix with a dark and ominous presence
